thread.title: Dez Bryant has a pet monkey, and it's a handful ... barely
thread.title_full: Dez Bryant has a pet monkey, and it's a handful ... barely | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Dez Bryant has a pet monkey, and it's a handful ... barely
text:
Injuries have been the monkey on the Cowboys' back this season, particularly injuries to wide receiver Dez Bryant and quarterback Tony Romo.
It's possible that Bryant could return from his foot injury in time for Dallas' game Sunday vs. the New York Giants. Romo's return is expected sometime in November. Dez has been doing some individual work during Cowboys practices.
He's been staying busy in other ways as well during his down time.
Bryant, it appears, is the proud owner of a baby monkey.
My new best friend.... Dallas Bryant world #throwupthex
A photo posted by Dez Bryant (@dezbryant) on Oct 21, 2015 at 3:40pm PDT
Given the expression of surprise on the monkey's face, can we assume he - or is it a she? - thinks Dez will be ready to roll vs. the Giants?
